title: Maximum 50% of total proposed Built-up area may be permitted for allied serices / support services including commercial and residential activities except polluting activities
clause_text: Maximum 50% of total proposed Built-up area may be permitted for allied serices / support services including commercial and residential activities except polluting activities. (1)
